languages.text: "Дворяне Даргонуса — глубокоуважаемые, богатые и влиятельные персоны, которые долгие годы пользовались благорасположением Леди Теодоры и сумели значительно возвыситься, верно служа Вольному Торговцу. Каждое семейство преследует свои корыстные интересы и каждое рассчитывает на то, что со сменой власти они не только сохранят, но и приумножат свои владения и богатства. Семейства, которым я рекомендую уделить особое внимание — Драйвстем, Гапрак и Зауэрбэк. Также упоминания заслуживает род Версериан, который не является де факто дворянским, но был приближен к леди Теодоре — к вящему недовольству обладателей голубой крови".

traits.locale_text: "Дворяне Даргонуса — глубокоуважаемые, богатые и влиятельные персоны, которые долгие годы пользовались благорасположением леди Теодоры и сумели значительно возвыситься, верно служа Вольному Торговцу. Каждое семейство преследует свои корыстные интересы и каждое рассчитывает на то, что со сменой власти они не только сохранят, но и преумножат свои владения и богатства. Семейства, которым я рекомендую уделить особое внимание — Драйвстем, Гапрак и Зауэрбэк. Также упоминания заслуживает род Версериан, который не является де факто дворянским, но был приближен к леди Теодоре — к вящему недовольству обладателей голубой крови".

languages.text: "The nobles of Dargonus are well-respected, rich, and powerful individuals who held Lady Theodora's favour for many years and found ways to rise above the rest by diligently serving the Rogue Trader. Every family pursues its own selfish interests, and each one expects that with the transition of power, they will retain and even add to their lands and wealth. The families I would recommend giving particular attention to are the Drivestems, the Gapraks, and the Sauerbacks. I should also mention the Werserians — not a noble house per se, but a family that was part of Lady Theodora's inner circle, to the blue bloods' great displeasure."
languages.original_text: "Дворяне Даргонуса — глубокоуважаемые, богатые и влиятельные персоны, которые долгие годы пользовались благорасположением Леди Теодоры и сумели значительно возвыситься, верно служа Вольному Торговцу. traits.locale_text: "The nobles of Dargonus are well-respected, rich, and powerful individuals who held Lady Theodora's favor for many years and found ways to rise above the rest by diligently serving the Rogue Trader. Every family pursues its own selfish interests, and each one expects that with the transition of power, they will get to retain and even add to their lands and wealth. The families I would recommend giving particular attention to are the Drivestems, the Gapraks, and the Zowerbacks. I should also mention the Werserians — not a noble house per se, but a family that was part of Lady Theodora's inner circle, to the blue bloods' great displeasure."

languages.text: “达戈努斯的贵族都是受人尊敬、有权有势的富人。这么多年来，他们一直受到西奥多拉夫人的青睐。而且，他们孜孜不倦地侍奉行商浪人，不断地超越其他人。每个家族都在追求私利，他们也都希望当权力进行更迭之后，他们的土地与财富不会受到影响，甚至会变得更多。我建议您特别留意德莱夫斯塔家族、贾帕克家族和苏尔贝克家族。此外，韦尔森家族也值得一提。这个家族本身并非贵族家族，但也在西奥多拉夫人的核心圈子之内，这让那些贵族非常不满。”
languages.original_text: "The nobles of Dargonus are well-respected, rich, and powerful individuals who held Lady Theodora's favour for many years and found ways to rise above the rest by diligently serving the Rogue Trader. Every family pursues its own selfish interests, and each one expects that with the transition of power, they will retain and even add to their lands and wealth. The families I would recommend giving particular attention to are the Drivestems, the Gapraks, and the Sauerbacks. I should also mention the Werserians — not a noble house per se, but a family that was part of Lady Theodora's inner circle, to the blue bloods' great displeasure."

traits.locale_text: “达戈努斯的贵族都是受人尊敬、有权有势的富人。这么多年来，他们一直受到西奥多拉夫人的的青睐。而且，他们孜孜不倦地侍奉行商浪人，不断地超越其他人。每个家族都在追求私利，他们也都希望当权力进行更迭之后，他们的土地与财富不会受到影响，甚至会变得更多。我建议您特别留意德莱夫斯塔家族、贾帕克家族和苏尔贝克家族。此外，韦尔森家族也值得一提。这个家族本身并非贵族家族，但也在西奥多拉夫人的核心圈子之内，这让那些贵族非常不满。”

languages.text: «Los nobles de Dargonus son individuos respetados, ricos y poderosos que gozaron del favor de lady Theodora durante años, elevándose por encima de los demás sirviendo diligentemente a la Círculo Interior. Cada familia tiene sus propios intereses egoístas y todas esperan que, con la transición del poder, sus fortunas y tierras se mantengan o incluso se expandan. En concreto, le recomendaría prestar atención a los Drivestem, los Gaprak y los Sauerback. También debo mencionar a los Werserian que, sin ser una casa noble de por sí, son una familia que formaba parte del círculo interior de lady Theodora, para gran disgusto de los nobles».
languages.original_text: "The nobles of Dargonus are well-respected, rich, and powerful individuals who held Lady Theodora's favour for many years and found ways to rise above the rest by diligently serving the Rogue Trader. Every family pursues its own selfish interests, and each one expects that with the transition of power, they will retain and even add to their lands and wealth. The families I would recommend giving particular attention to are the Drivestems, the Gapraks, and the Sauerbacks. I should also mention the Werserians — not a noble house per se, but a family that was part of Lady Theodora's inner circle, to the blue bloods' great displeasure."

traits.locale_text: «Los nobles de Dargonus son individuos respetados, ricos y poderosos que gozaron del favor de lady Theodora durante años, elevándose por encima de los demás sirviendo diligentemente a la Círculo Interior. Cada familia tiene sus propios intereses egoístas y todas esperan que, con la transición del poder, sus fortunas y tierras se mantengan o incluso se expandan. En concreto, le recomendaría prestar atención a los Drivestem, los Gaprak y los Sauerback. También debo mencionar a los Werserian que, sin ser una casa noble de por sí, son una familia que formaba parte del círculo interior de lady Theodora, para gran disgusto de los nobles».

languages.text: 「ダルゴナスの貴族たちは大いに尊敬されており、裕福かつ影響力を持った者たちです。長年、シオドーラ様の援助を受けていましたから、自由開拓者に熱心に仕えることで、そうしない者たちより高く評価されていると認識しています。あらゆる家が自分本位に己の利益を求め、各家は自分たちの土地と富を保つどころか増やすために権力の移譲を期待しています。特に注意を要する家はドライブステム家、ギャプラック家、そしてザウアーバック家。ああ、ウェルザリアン家にも言及しておかなくては―本来は高貴な家柄ではありませんが、シオドーラ様の執行会の一員であり、上流階級からは大いに不満が出ています」
languages.original_text: "The nobles of Dargonus are well-respected, rich, and powerful individuals who held Lady Theodora's favour for many years and found ways to rise above the rest by diligently serving the Rogue Trader. Every family pursues its own selfish interests, and each one expects that with the transition of power, they will retain and even add to their lands and wealth. The families I would recommend giving particular attention to are the Drivestems, the Gapraks, and the Sauerbacks. I should also mention the Werserians — not a noble house per se, but a family that was part of Lady Theodora's inner circle, to the blue bloods' great displeasure."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴナスの貴族たちは大いに尊敬されており、裕福かつ影響力を持った者たちです。長年、シオドーラ様の援助を受けていましたから、自由開拓者に熱心に仕えることで、そうしない者たちより高く評価されていると認識しています。あらゆる家が自分本位に己の利益を求め、各家は自分たちの土地と富を保つどころか増やすために権力の移譲を期待しています。特に注意を要する家はドライブステム家、ギャプラック家、そしてザウアーバック家。ああ、ウェルザリアン家にも言及しておかなくては―本来は高貴な家柄ではありませんが、シオドーラ様の執行会の一員であり、上流階級からは大いに不満が出ています」

languages.text: "Die Adligen von Dargonus sind angesehene, reiche und mächtige Personen, die über viele Jahre in der Gunst von Lady Theodora standen und Wege fanden, sich über die anderen zu stellen, indem sie dem Freihändler unablässig dienten. Jede Familie verfolgt ihre eigenen, egoistischen Interessen, und alle erwarten, dass sie mit der Übergabe der Macht ihre Ländereien und ihren Wohlstand behalten oder sogar vergrößern. Besonderes Augenmerk solltet Ihr meiner Ansicht nach den Familien Drivestem, Gaprak und Sauerback widmen. Erwähnen möchte ich auch die Werserians – zwar kein Adelshaus, aber eine Familie, die zu Lady Theodoras innerem Zirkel gehörte, was den Blaublütern ganz und gar nicht gefiel."
languages.original_text: "The nobles of Dargonus are well-respected, rich, and powerful individuals who held Lady Theodora's favour for many years and found ways to rise above the rest by diligently serving the Rogue Trader. Every family pursues its own selfish interests, and each one expects that with the transition of power, they will retain and even add to their lands and wealth. The families I would recommend giving particular attention to are the Drivestems, the Gapraks, and the Sauerbacks. I should also mention the Werserians — not a noble house per se, but a family that was part of Lady Theodora's inner circle, to the blue bloods' great displeasure."

traits.locale_text: "Die Adligen on Dargonus sind angesehene, reiche und mächtige Personen, die über viele Jahre in der Gunst von Lady Theodora standen und Wege fanden, sich über die anderen zu stellen, indem sie dem Freihändler unablässig dienten. Jede Familie verfolgt ihre eigenen, egoistischen Interessen, und alle erwarten, dass sie mit der Übergabe der Macht ihre Ländereien und ihren Wohlstand behalten oder sogar vergrößern. Besonderes Augenmerk solltet Ihr meiner Ansicht nach den Familien Drivestem, Gaprak und Sauerback widmen. Erwähnen möchte ich auch die Werserians – zwar kein Adelshaus, aber eine Familie, die zu Lady Theodoras innerem Zirkel gehörte, was den Blaublütern ganz und gar nicht gefiel."

languages.text: « La noblesse de Dargonus est respectée, riche et puissante. Pendant bien des années, ces gens sont restés dans les bonnes grâces de dame Théodora en se mettant à son service pour essayer de s'élever toujours plus haut. Chaque famille poursuit ses propres intérêts et n'espère qu'une chose de la transition : gagner en terres et en richesses. Celles qui, selon moi, méritent d'être vraiment surveillées sont les Drivestem, les Gaprak et les Sauerback. Sans oublier les Werserian. Même s'ils ne sont pas des nobles à proprement parler, ils faisaient partie de l'entourage proche de dame Théodora, au grand dam des nobles de sang. »
languages.original_text: "The nobles of Dargonus are well-respected, rich, and powerful individuals who held Lady Theodora's favour for many years and found ways to rise above the rest by diligently serving the Rogue Trader. Every family pursues its own selfish interests, and each one expects that with the transition of power, they will retain and even add to their lands and wealth. The families I would recommend giving particular attention to are the Drivestems, the Gapraks, and the Sauerbacks. I should also mention the Werserians — not a noble house per se, but a family that was part of Lady Theodora's inner circle, to the blue bloods' great displeasure."

traits.locale_text: « La noblesse de Dargonus est respectée, riche et puissante. Pendant bien des années, ces gens sont restés dans les bonnes grâces de dame Théodora en se mettant à son service pour essayer de s'élever toujours plus haut. Chaque famille poursuit ses propres intérêts et n'espère qu'une chose de la transition : gagner en terres et en richesses. Celles qui, selon moi, méritent d'être vraiment surveillées sont les Drivestem, les Gaprak et les Sauerback. Sans oublier les Werserian. Même s'ils ne sont pas des nobles à proprement parler, ils faisaient partie de l'entourage proche de dame Théodora, au grand dam des nobles de sang. »

languages.text: "Dargonus soyluları; saygıdeğer, zengin ve güçlü bireyler olup yıllar boyu Leydi Theodora'nın desteğini almış ve Hür Tacir'e gayretli bir şekilde hizmet ederek konumlarını yükseltmenin yolunu bulmuşlardır. Bütün aileler kendi çıkarlarını gözetir. Bu güç değişimi sonrasında diyarlarını ve servetlerini muhafaza etmeyi, hatta artırmayı amaçladıklarını tahmin etmek zor değil. Özellikle dikkatinizi yoğunlaştırmanızı önereceğim aileler; Drivestemler, Gapraklar ve Sauerbackler. Werserianların da adını anmalıyım. Tam olarak soylu olmayıp asilzadelerin hoşnutsuzluğuna rağmen Leydi Theodora'nın yakın çevresinin bir parçasıydılar."
languages.original_text: "The nobles of Dargonus are well-respected, rich, and powerful individuals who held Lady Theodora's favour for many years and found ways to rise above the rest by diligently serving the Rogue Trader. Every family pursues its own selfish interests, and each one expects that with the transition of power, they will retain and even add to their lands and wealth. The families I would recommend giving particular attention to are the Drivestems, the Gapraks, and the Sauerbacks. I should also mention the Werserians — not a noble house per se, but a family that was part of Lady Theodora's inner circle, to the blue bloods' great displeasure."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus soyluları saygı duyulan, zengin ve güçlü bireylerdir ve yıllar boyunca Leydi Theodora'nın desteğini almış ve Hür Tacir'e gayretli bir şekilde hizmet ederek diğerlerinden daha yüksek bir konuma çıkmanın yöntemlerini bulmuşlardır. Bütün aileler kendi çıkarlarını gözetmekteler ve bu güç değişimi sonrasında diyarlarını ve servetlerini muhafaza etmeyi, hatta artırmayı amaçladıklarını tahmin etmek zor değil. Özellikle dikkatinizi yoğunlaştırmanızı önereceğim aileler Drivestemler, Gapraklar ve Sauerbackler. Werserianların da adını anmalıyım. Soylu bir aile değil tam olarak ama asilzadeler durumdan hoşlanmasa da Leydi Theodora'nın yakın çevresinin bir parçasıydılar."
